MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH42 postcode area of Birkenhead, affecting properties in Derby Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.00PM due to a fault on our underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.21PM on 17th April 2021.
